name: Insomnia's Window
description:
Story Description:

You're an overworked receptionist that's been having a tough time at work. As a result, your sleeping habits have suffered a bit and you're unable to do much sleeping at all. Who better to escort you to dreamland than your boyfriend? <3

Features:

  • Nameable Female Protagonist
  • An Older Boyfriend DILF
  • 3600 Words
  • Pixel Art
  • 2 Different Choices/Routes (1 Unlockable Choice/Route)
  • Afterstory (1330 Words + Art)
  • 8 Different Character Sprites
  • Soft Music

Special Thanks:

Big shoutout to my friends Alou, Dark, Fleeting_Fantasy, SpudMuffin and Zhiro for beta testing and giving me feedback on the game! I appreciate you guys very much, and I couldn't have done this without your support! 

Extras:

  • Try entering your boyfriend's name in as your own! (Small easter egg)
  • Remember to play through the game a third time for the extra choice/route! 
  • NOTICE: The Afterstory gets a little suggestive toward the end, after the timeskip (17+), so please be mindful of that!
  • Link to my Twitter! Casual plug

P.S. If you plan to upload to YouTube or stream it on Twitch, don't worry! The music I used has no copyright on it so you're good to go!
